content.label: I got this game because I love all horror games and I thought this would be a good one. I payed for this game after reading the reviews and people said it was such a good game. I was told that it was such a scary game just what I was looking for. At first I gave it a few levels and then gave it a break. Then in the next few days when I played it I asked myself, " What did I buy?" And finally deleted the game.  MY TIP: WATCH THE TRAILER AND UNLESS YOU ARE AFRAID OF LINES THIS IS NOT GOING TO BE A GOOD HORROR GAME FOR YOU
Stuck on Follower, I c the exit but it keeps being block by a wall that I cannot pass as soon as I get close to it

It was all fun until i came to the episode Crash and whilst I was trying to figure how to pass it the game literally crashed* A funny quincedence you say huh? Maybe, or maybe not but I had to restart my phone.

Edit: another bug, if you get a messanger alert and try to check the not bar while playing it will crush and you won't be able to open it up again until you restart your phone. Give this app an update omg.

title.label: Best!! It's not a horror game.

content.label:
Ok...first. It's totally worth the $2üí∞!! Second. It's not TO scary. The only part I'm scared of, is when I'm in a dark room and the guy screams...and dies! It's more entertainment then horror. Totally rated-Teen.

 Improvement ideas:
1. Helps (hints) on the levels.

I really hate to be that person that nags about some little flaw, but I just have to. Don‚Äôt get me wrong, this game is just amazing. You just don‚Äôt get much more creative than this. But seriously, fix the dad gum rock mechanic! It was just that one thing that kept me from declaring this heaven-caliber(kind of ironic, I know) material. It‚Äôs quite unresponsive, it just feels weird to have to draw a line off to the side, and don‚Äôt even talk to me about trying to throw one while in the water while not budging enough to blow your cover. What I propose is that you put a button in the corner, so that you can tap the button, then just tap in the direction that you want to throw the rock. That‚Äôs what I would do, anyway.
Does not even launch on 6s iOS 9.2. Crashes entire phone.

This is the first time for me to write a review for a game. I played a lot of game. And some of them are actually very good, the room 1,2,3 for example. But this one is really make me excited.
I didn't get what is it at the first, after reading some of the reviews, I decided to give it a try. First, I have to say I love watching horror movies. However, movies sometimes can be tedious. You can not feel you are actually in the scene. But this game somehow is quite different. After you plugged in your headphones, you are the character. You can feel the fear. You can feel something is chasing after you. But you can't see. Unknown, that's what make you scared. 
Download it, if you love horror movies, and play it at night. Good luck.
Wonderful app with a different concept ... Only played for half an hour and i already got what i paid for :)

This game it amazing! You have been sent on a series of rooms when you have just been blinded. Your hearing is twice as good... When you move, some of the room has been revealed... When you clap, you see almost everything for a short amount of time. As you continue, you realize that you are not alone... These creatures that try to hunt you down, they follow the sound that you make... Try to escape...
Very unusual game where you play ostensibly like a blind person, although the blindness is represented visually and schematically. Very cool and definitely worth trying!

I would have gone an given it a 5 but. 

It's not scary, it's not a horror game. I was expecting more intimidation.
You click an hold to move, you see the sound waves to show you the hall way an what way you can go. 
You can also hold an tap to echo as far as it can go so you can see farther in the room. 
It's really super fun no lie. But some of the reviews I thought maybe were fake because they really built it up to way beyond itself so I just had to try. But ya no not scary at all.
First off I love how you created a game based off of listening. This game is addicting and I love every second of it. The creators did a great job!
Wonderful app, but it doesn't seem to be compatible with iOS 9.

Boring! Really? Who finds this scary and exciting?  I read some reviews and they talk about how amazing and addicting this game is. Ok I just don't see how amazing this is. Just plain and simple....it's really boring!!!
This game is not easy but extremely fun. Don't ever pass an opportunity like this one for a great experience.
I absolutely love this app. It is definitely worth the two dollars. The sounds are wonderful and creep. Its just amazing

title.label: Interesting and new idea for a game.

content.label: Take a new perspective with this interesting thriller game.
It's fun and different from other games! Pretty fun so far!

title.label: Not worth the price of entry

content.label: Tedious, repetitive, and never actually frightening. I scare easily at horror games but was utterly bored with Dark Echo. The core gameplay isn't enough to sustain the experience anyway.
Couldn't get into it. I gave a try and kept at it for bit.
just got the game I hope I like it

title.label: It's a great game, but I have a problem.

content.label: It's fun and enjoyable. Not to mention that it's a great concept. However... I can't hear anything. Headphones plugged in and sound all the way up, no sound. No headphones and sound all the way up, no sound. Can anyone help me?
Just wasted my money! Thanks a lot! I don't know why iTunes doesn't do a better job weeding out these crappy games!

title.label: I love it just... So many ‚ù§Ô∏èattacks

content.label: I love this game so far(I'm bad at it). The game is awesome because you always have to be quiet or play it smart. By the way the death scream has dug itself in my brain.
I love this game, it is super addictive, though the last level is super hard... TRY this game at least, it's really cool

title.label: NOT horror! Only fun for five minutes!

content.label: Well, I bought this game hoping that it's reviews were genuine. This game is not only as scary as the muppet babies, but the mechanics loose steam very quickly. I was hoping to have a game that would be stimulating and scary but to my disappointment this game is lacking in every department as soon as you understand the monotone  mechanics. It's a walk around game where you walk away from red circles and when you get too close a scream happens and I guess it's supposed to be scary... Lame duck game... Where is my $$....

I know my opinion doesn't really matter, but maybe it can save you from wasting a $1.99. The game is quite repetitive. But, it's incredibly fun for a while. If there were more mechanics and the price was .99 I would easily recommend this as one of the better horror games on the App Store. Well, if you can call it a horror game. This game was never scary, just creepy. I was never even close to being scared, even with headphones in the dark. The horror element was never really there for me. But, if your looking for an intuitive echolocation-based adventure game with sharp, responsive controls, stealth elements and a lot of suspense at times this is for you.
I like the concept, but I wish there were a story line and more of a reason to get out
Ok don't get me wrong this game is awesome!!! Great premise cool idea good gameplay just one problem, this is not even close to a "horror" game it's really not scary or creepy at all

title.label: This game has me at the edge of my seat!

content.label: I highly recommend this game for anybody especially for hardcore horror gamers like me. Game will give you chills!!!

I am not one that normally likes horror games but this has definitely grabbed my attention. The unique gameplay style and outstanding audio engineering have me creeped out but not scared enough to stop playing. It's tense, scary, and extremely addictive. Well worth the money.

title.label: Creative, intense but a bit short

content.label: This is a very creative game. Never played sth liked this one before. Good job team! Very intense and addictive! But finished the whole thing only within a few hrs ...
This game is amazing! The later levels get really hard, but I just can't stop playing! One of my favorite games!!!

Wow! I am seriously impressed by the amount of thought and effort put into this game.  It is truly amazing and thought-provoking.  Highly suggest playing!
Play in the dark with head phones on
DANG this is an awesome game!
Seriously this game is so boring.Its the same thing over and over again.

This is an amazing game that requires puzzle solving. Only the puzzle is invisible without sound. The only complaint I have is that the walking command needs to be less sensitive because every third stone I through also makes me take a step, resulting in my death. It can't really throw the stones quickly because of this. But the game never makes me mad about this. It just makes me reconsider my strategy! This is a must get!

title.label: Best game I have played so far !

content.label: I really enjoyed playing this game. Even though there are certain levels towards the end where the walls start moving which gets a little annoying.. But overall amazing game !
It's a really good game. If you put your headphones on, it gets even better! It's one of the kind strategic/scary games I've seen. It's a really simple looking but yet challenging game!
I installed the app b4 it was priced lol
The idea was nice, and it is tense at times, but without a story, I have no reason to keep playing it.

This game is amazing. Do NOT listen to negative reviews. They probably just got angry because they couldn't beat a level. This game is soooo interesting and thought provoking. I'm still trying to figure out the story!........eeeeejjjhhhh

I applaud the creators of this game. Dark Echo is eerie, creepy, creative, puzzling, quiet, and loud. For the best experience, play this at night, alone, with headphones and lights off. I promise you you'll be on the edge of your seat. Who would've thought a cluster of red lines could be so scary? Now this is true horror. No demonic teddy bear, no zombies, no jump scares. Just the sound echo of your hands and feet... and those of others.
Good game though...
I think the people who wrote the positive reviews for this were paid off. I don't get what the fuss is about.
2spooky4me

I loved this game so much it was fun and exciting to play and it gave me the chills!! I always recommend this game to my friends because it's one of the best games I've played and it was the first game that kept me intrigued till the very end! Overall amazing concept. perfect game üëå‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
Very creative idea. This game is well built and is fun to play. Sound effects done especially well.
I love this game. Great horror game. Should add more levels

At first I loved the game a puzzle and horror game combined! Awesome! It even came to the point where I stopped playing for a bit cuz it was so scary (not TOO much though) and I like the reality of it, you being stuck in the darkness with monsters and you using sound to find a way out, But monsters also using the sound you make to hunt you down.  It's a cool game would definitely recommend it.
THIS GAME IS SOOO ADDICTING!!! RADDEST APP OUT THERE
